Uses of Package
cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure

  • Classes in cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure used by cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure 
    Class and Description
    Choice
    This is a simple object that will contain the information related to a particular choice, which will allow the transition from one fragment to another while reading.
    ChoiceListListener
    The ChoiceListListener interface is an interface that must be implemented by any activity using a ChoiceListFragment.
    LibraryManager
    This interface is designed to interact with stored stories.
    LocalManager
    This class is designed to maintain all of the stories that are stored locally on the user's device.
    Media
    The Media interface is an interface which must be implemented by any classes that will be used as media types inside a Fragment.
    MediaInteractionManager
    Class for managing interaction and interaction options with Media.
    MediaType 
    ReadStoryManager
    ReadStoryManager is the connection between various activities and a story.
    Story
    Story object, basic functional unit for a story.
    StoryFragment
    StoryFragment object, essentially a single page for a story.
    StoryFragmentInfo
    StoryFragmentInfo class, used to represent StoryFragments in a list.
    StoryFragmentListListener
    The StoryFragmentListListener interface is an interface that must be implemented by any activity using a StoryFragmentListFragment.
    StoryInfo
    StoryInfo class.
